data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Izumi of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yusuke Araki awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kosuke Onose puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Shu Kurata to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, In Kashima Kashima attack through Daiki Sugioka. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Goal kick for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba drives forward and Patric gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Takashi Usami gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gamba.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In Kashima Kashima drive forward through Juan Alano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 13, The match at Kashima Soccer Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rikuto Hirose, who is down injured.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Rikuto Hirose, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Atsuto Uchida is the substitute for Kashima.
In the minute 16, Kashima have a goal kick.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Free kick Kashima.
Kashima are pushing forward but Ryuji Izumi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima's Juan Alano breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 23, Yusuke Araki signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashima's half.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 29, Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
Yusuke Araki awards Gamba a goal kick.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Kashima's Leo Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima's Juan Alano is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 34, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Everaldo for Kashima drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kashima are coming forward and Ryuji Izumi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 39, Atsuto Uchida (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Gamba.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yusuke Araki awards Kashima a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Kashima's Atsuto Uchida gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Masaaki Higashiguchi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Kashima pushes forward through Juan Alano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Kashima.
Takashi Usami of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 54, Important block from the Kashima defence as Kim Young-Gwon fires in a strike for Gamba.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Kashima's area.
In the minute 55, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Everaldo (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 57, Gamba needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 59, Kashima's Kento Misao gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Everaldo for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Gamba have a goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Gamba.
Zago is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Yasushi Endo replacing Juan Alano.
The home team replace Ryuji Izumi with Ayase Ueda.
In the minute 65, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Kashima drives forward and Shoma Doi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Takashi Usami with Yuji Ono. This is the first substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Ryu Takao is on a sub for Shu Kurata for Gamba.
In the minute 68, Gamba needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima drive forward but Ayase Ueda is judged offside.
In the minute 72, Yusuke Araki signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashima's half.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kashima Gamba drive forward through Kosuke Onose. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yosuke Ideguchi for Gamba drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 75, Kashima make their fourth substitution with Itsuki Someno replacing Everaldo.
Ryotaro Araki is replacing Kento Misao for the home team.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yasushi Endo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Gamba at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Ademilson is replacing Patric for the away team.
In the minute 83, Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a fourth substitution, with Yuki Yamamoto replacing Shinya Yajima.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 85, Shoma Doi for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ademilson for Gamba is whistled offside.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gamba's Yuji Ono has been booked in Kashima.
In the minute 88, Kashima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
Leo Silva (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Yusuke Araki awards Gamba a goal kick.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Free kick in a good position for Gamba!
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
That's full-time at Kashima Soccer Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
The away team replace Yuya Fukuda with Hiroki Fujiharu.
Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Ryotaro Araki.
